product_name: Patagonia R2 Fleece Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Made from breathable, compressible, stretchy, high-loft Regulator(R) fleece, the women's Patagonia R2 Fleece Jacket provides excellent lightweight insulation for any outdoor activity. R2 Jacket traps heat and breathes freely, so it keeps you warm but not swampy during exertion. Regulator fleece is made from a refined Polartec(R) Thermal Pro(R) polyester fabric, which is super light, extremely compressible, mostly recycled, stretchy and soft. Short-sheared but high-loft face has a smooth appearance, and the directional knit wicks moisture superbly and enhances dry times. Polartec(R) Power Stretch(R) panels on the sides and forearms increase durability in high-wear areas and allow for a close fit while retaining warmth. Softly lined inner collar and chin flap offers next-to-skin comfort. Zippered chest and handwarmer pockets. The women's Patagonia R2 jacket has a refined technical fit, reduced underarm lift, and offset seams for comfort under outerwear and packs. Closeout.
short_description: Made from breathable, compressible, stretchy, high-loft Regulator(R) fleece, the women's Patagonia R2 Fleece Jacket provides excellent lightweight insulation for any outdoor activity.
